const About = () => { return (

About Tipsaza

We are a high school teenagers born and grown up with devices and the internet in our hand. Hence, we are a great researcher and a quick learners

We spend lot and lot of time to extract the raw information from tons of sources about any particular subject. We then write it down in such a way that a person with zero knowledge will be able to talk about it and could explain others

The purpose of this work that do is to make sure you don't waste your valuable time going through tons of articles to understand any matter but be fully gained in a single page.

) } export default About;
